content_parts.title: Introduction
content_parts.content: You'll find release notes for all updates such as features, improvements, and bug fixes.

Update landing page - Return request and credit memo

When selecting Sales return request OR Credit memo from the menu items, the page now opens on the first record in the navigation panel (not on an empty record).

Working days default value on customer shipping address

When creating a new shipping address on a customer record, the working days will default  with the following values:

  • isMondayWorkDay = true
  • isTuesdayWorkDay = true
  • isWednesdayWorkDay = true
  • isThursdayWorkDay = true
  • isFridayWorkDay = true
  • isStaturdayWorkDay = false
  • isSundayWorkDay = false
Items - Add sales units on max and min quantity fields

On Item > Sales tab, the sales unit has been added in the maximum and minimum sales quantity fields.

content_parts.content: Adding a default local inplace of an error when local does not exist

content_parts.title: Currency conversion in the purchase process

content_parts.content: You can trade with your suppliers in transaction currencies that are different from the company currency. The transaction amounts and the stock valuation are displayed in the transaction currency and converted into the company currency based on the most recent exchange rate for the given document date.

content_parts.title: Currency conversion in the sales process

content_parts.content: You can trade with your customers in transaction currencies that are different from the company currency. The transaction amounts and the stock valuation are displayed in the transaction currency and converted into the company currency based on the most recent exchange rate for the given document date.

content_parts.title: VAT management implemented in the  Sales order function

content_parts.content: The Sales order function complies with the tax management requirements: It includes tax determination rules, tax calculation, and tax management so that you can identify the taxes to apply on the sales order lines.

A functionality has been added to populate, on the sales documents, the Gross price, and Discount and/or Charge in percentage based on the item-customer price list: it identifies the correct item-customer price line and returns the corresponding values. If no item-customer price line is identified, the item gross price defaults to the item base price. Information related to prices is displayed in the detail panels of the applicable sales document lines.

Price list management for sales allows users to store, per item, the proposed price for a selected customer, so that specific prices can be defined per customer when the standard price is not applicable.

This price per item and customer is displayed in the Item and Customer fonctions. The standard price that will be considered if no specific customer price is defined is the Base price defined in the Item function.

The following features have been created:

  • Customer price reason: This function has been created to define customer price reasons. On each item-customer line, you can select one of those price reasons.
  • Sales prices on items: The Sales prices tab has been added in the Item function, next to the Sales tab.
  • Sales prices on customers: The Item prices tab has been added in the Customer function, next to the Items tab.

When you first log in, you can select which cookies you want to accept:

  • Must-have cookies to operate the platform
  • Performance cookies
  • Marketing cookies

Based on your consent, Sage uses analytics and log management tools to improve your product experience.

Sage enhanced the report writer to simplify the localization of reports written in a different language and added additional functions to localize dates and amounts.

On the Translation tab, you can translate untranslated text found in the report into all supported languages.

On the template's Preview tab, you can display a preview in every language.

content_parts.title: Journal entry types: define accounts per legislation

content_parts.content: The journal entry type setup includes improved setting options for consistent and transparent journal account determination. Defining an individual account for all business flows can be done per legislation.
